summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the construction and acquisition of a railroad from the Gorge Creek Crib Diversion Dam to Diablo Canyon on the Skagit River, and the construction and acquisition of a concrete arch dam across the Skagit River at Diablo Canyon; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be, and providing for the issuance and sale of bonds of said City to provide funds therefor; creating and establishing a construction fund; and creating and establishing a special fund to pay the principal and intersection of such bonds.
